DEBUG   makolator gen(['main.txt.mako'], PosixPath('TMP/main.txt'))
INFO    makolator Template 'PRJROOT/tests/testdata/main.txt.mako'
INFO    makolator Generate 'TMP/main.txt'
DEBUG   makolator gen(['sub.txt.mako'], PosixPath('TMP/sub1.txt'))
INFO    makolator Template 'PRJROOT/tests/testdata/sub.txt.mako'
INFO    makolator Generate 'TMP/sub1.txt'
DEBUG   makolator gen(['sub.txt.mako'], PosixPath('TMP/sub2.txt'))
INFO    makolator Template 'PRJROOT/tests/testdata/sub.txt.mako'
INFO    makolator Generate 'TMP/sub2.txt'
DEBUG   makolator inplace(['inplace.txt.mako'], PosixPath('TMP/inplace.txt'))
INFO    makolator Template 'PRJROOT/tests/testdata/inplace.txt.mako'
INFO    makolator Inplace 'TMP/inplace.txt:3'
INFO    makolator Inplace 'TMP/inplace.txt:7'
